thread_text: Ivy's sexy new thong edition oh shit what I meant to say was Physical Combat EditionDiscuss Trainer OCs and further your designs/writing behind them through discussion with others. Be cool, be cringy, be creative, be whatever, just don’t be an idiot. Trolls, spammers, gooners, pet rocks, and ERPers are not welcome.>Thread question: What kind of books does your OC like to read?>Drawing Task: Draw your OC as if they are from another IP, could be Digimon, could be monster hunter, etc.>Writing task: Your OC is trying to recruit a new Pokémon, write how they try to catch it or how they gain its favor.>/tog/ artwork:https://mega.nz/folder/7MZhhRzA#d__DtSaqxctoawZZL3hxWw>/tog/ writing:https://rentry.co/TOGWriting>/tog/ resources:https://rentry.co/TOGocCreationResources>/tog/ OP:https://rentry.co/TOGopTemplate>Previous thread: >>57937280

posts.title: /tog/ - Trainer OCs General
posts.text: Ivy's sexy new thong edition oh shit what I meant to say was Physical Combat EditionDiscuss Trainer OCs and further your designs/writing behind them through discussion with others. Be cool, be cringy, be creative, be whatever, just don’t be an idiot. Trolls, spammers, gooners, pet rocks, and ERPers are not welcome.>Thread question: What kind of books does your OC like to read?>Drawing Task: Draw your OC as if they are from another IP, could be Digimon, could be monster hunter, etc.>Writing task: Your OC is trying to recruit a new Pokémon, write how they try to catch it or how they gain its favor.>/tog/ artwork:https://mega.nz/folder/7MZhhRzA#d__DtSaqxctoawZZL3hxWw>/tog/ writing:https://rentry.co/TOGWriting>/tog/ resources:https://rentry.co/TOGocCreationResources>/tog/ OP:https://rentry.co/TOGopTemplate>Previous thread: >>57937280

>>57991874After two months of painstaking hard work, I am pleased to announce that the archive is now back up, with sections dedicated to the works of all of our major contributors across this thread's one and a half year lifespan. I couldn't have done it without my accomplice Gene, who seamlessly picked up wherever I left off in this ordeal. I am so proud of everything that you all have made. It is a testament to our resilience and creativity. Thank you for making /tog/ and its archives the special places that they are.I am now going to bed.

I wasnt posting the latest updates because I was helping him organize the mega.>>57991925You still did way more than I, remembering and knowing who was by which anon and what notanyway, updatehttps://files.catbox.moe/fhokyn.pngI dont know what is a monkey mutt but they got a body count. Bibi, Alto, and Alex.
>>57991956>what is a monkey muttDavid
Is this just a place where you dump your Pokémon OCs?

>>57991996Pretty much, you post your trainer OC, either drawn, AI generated if you dont have the skills to draw(yet), or use anything to represent it, talk about it, of its story or be basically a writing exercise.
>>57992009...they don't even share a universe or anything? How is that supposed to keep an entire general going?

>>57992019We do, it just depends on how is the mood of each other, Sometimes it's just solo stories, sometimes we agree upon something, some story, some activity or just an anon wanting to draw the OC of other anon alongside their own OC. We don't have a hard canon compared to, like, scarlet verse or any other fan project that was created in these forums.
>>57992019If your OC is hot enough other people will interact with you. Maybe you'll get art.
>>57991925>>57991956you two are wonderful thank you!
>>57992019No but we have crossovers

>>57991874>TQ>QuartzI have not given it much thought as to what kind of books Quartz likes to read, but if there are any, it might be manga. His hobbies related to Pokémon Contests keep him pretty busy. >DariusAs a keeper of lore, he reads all the time, but he most likes reading about history, occult knowledge, anything that will give him more knowledge, folklore, etc. He doesn't like wasting his time on fiction, though. >EifnrHe only reads about his family history; otherwise, he doesn't do a lot of reading. >>57991925>File is named Quartz and friends>Has Gabriel on itHaha, I was actually worried that because I separated them in posts before, I was breaking some kind of rule, but yeah, I also own Gabriel, but he is in a different campaign than Quartz and the others. >TQ GabrielGabriel doesn't read too well since he spent a few years as a Pokémon and has amnesia from the time before that. He reads mostly to try and relearn how to read and write.
>>57992062Do you ever… develop the characters?
>>57992178Develop in what way? Because stories and art are ways to develop a character.
>>57992191Give them new Pokémon, have them grow as people, let them age? Anything of the sort.

>>57992194Well, I already have a path, or a prototype for my character. I'm mainly trying to get myself to replay Gen 4, and maybe investigate to play Gen 5 to 7.I could see a playthrough online, but I feel Pokémon is one of those games you need to play to get.I'll probably do that with Gen 8 and 9, no way I'm downloading a whole ass emulator to play those games, that have DLC that lock what we called "postgame".In Gen 10, I'm retiring him for sure.
>>57992211Are you going to play through the games as him and write about it?

>>57992232Sort of. I replayed Gen 1 to 3 many times, but I haven't touch 4 too much, and I haven't played the spin offs (unless you want to count PK: Pinball).The idea was that he comes from Hoenn, travels around, some things happen to him, he settles down in Gen 9, and by 10 he properly retires.Gen 11 I will start it with a full new OC, completely separated from the first.
>>57991956I am just surprised Quartz made it this far. Without Hiver's help, he is pretty much helpless, except for his keen mind in game theory.

>>57992178yes to varying degrees. Someone of us play our characters in ttrpgs my character Luke has aged from 17-32 in the campaign I played him in, I'm also writing a novelization of that campaign which is pretty fun to do. Others will update how their character dresses or looks or add pokemon to their team every now and then. I think we all do something with our characters in one way or another

>>57991874Quartzanon here. I was looking through the Mega, and inside the Athena folder is one of my OCs. the one with the red eyes. She is the daughter of my OC Darius, named AlbâtreIn the Cyril folder, there is a screenshot of Gabriel's Pokemon.Also in the Quartz folder is a Kirlia that is unrelated to the one Quartz hands around. It is file yidcg9.2.pngHope that helps out somewhat.

>>57992178This is an updated token for my OC Quartz. I leaned into the Black Butler reference a bit hard on this one; he struck a deal with his starter, Hiver, and she could place a symbol on his body as a form of contract between them. She is a very powerful Pokémon, but to balance it out, her power is sealed. Quartez wanted all of her power, so he had the symbol, an X (From the Roman alphabet, Chi), placed on his eye. I'd say that's quite the development. Quartz started his journey as a bit of a doormat, but now he'll sass you back and has way more of a backbone.

Been thinking about posting the OCs from my fanfictions here. So far they are a Final Fantasy 1 x Pokemon story, a paranormal comedy detective story, and an edgy hyper violent hybrid one shot. Do any of those sound interesting?
>>57992310Man, I wish I knew people to play Pokémon TTRPG campaigns with.

>>57992385A crossover you say? How much I need to know from each?I mean, I know a lot of Pokémon, but I haven't played the first Final Fantasy. Not even the GBA remake. But I was always curious, since you have sword nunchuks in that one.
>>57991956>David survivesIn the words of Ricardo Diaz: I lived! Dickheads!>*Passes out*
opinions on twins?

>>57993039Quartz is a twin, so I am biased. But twins are awesome. They have this strong bond that goes beyond just being siblings. In fiction, you can have all kinds of mojo going with them, too. In Quartz and Cobalt's case, they have been resetting the world line to save each other because fate keeps killing one of them off, and when one of them dies, the other one gets all of the other's power.

>>57992405The sword nunchucks are a meme, they are from a fan comic not the game sorry to say, but now that you've remided me of them I'm going to put a reference to them in the story.As for the fic, FF1's plot is so basic that all the characters have only a handful of lines each. I pretty much made OCs with their names to fill out their characters. The MC isn't even named in game so he's a wholesale OC. I tried to write it so that the story is enjoyable with no knowledge of FF. It's pretty much a pokemon story set in a classic fantasy setting. Tragedy strikes a kingdom and a knight and his blastoise set out to save the world.
>>57993159good, I hope you like more of them
>>57991925Yo Alexm I saw your character's Mystery Dungeon design. What a sick design. My OC Eifnr was also of the sneasel line when he got trapped in the PMD world.

>>57991874Louisanon here. I blame gundams this time. >Thread question: What kind of books does your OC like to read?Imported historical fiction. Cheap novels about the Ransei era, stuff set in fantastic versions of Qin, etc. >Writing task: Your OC is trying to recruit a new Pokémon, write how they try to catch it or how they gain its favor.Working on this in the chapter I'm actually working on, off-and-on. >>57992019>>57992178I'm cool with my guy being in roughly the same setting, but it's just I chose an out of the way region (Orre) for him to pop up in and am doing my own take on how it's going this far along in the timeline. I've got a few chapters of his story done, but want to get more finished before I really start posting it.>>57993039Potentially entertaining, but I prefer elder/younger sibling dynamics. It's part of why Louis is being written as having a younger sister who went fairy specialist, while he prefers poison and steel. >>57992385Oh hey FFanon. Go ahead.
I have gone too deep
>>57993763What did you find?
>>57993857a whole lot of work
>>57993896Damn. I hope you can tackle all of it. Or ask if you need any help.

>>57993357Heya. Might as well share some then.Wol: The second strongest knight in the Kingdom of Corneria whose silent competence as a leader of men is greatly respected. Chosen partner of Blastoise, one of the kingdom's legendary pokemon, he struggles to put to words his own self doubt with the lofty responsibilities he has found himself with. Content to live in the shadow of his gifted best friend after always falling just short in talent, but as betrayal threatens to tear the kingdom apart he finds himself the only one able to answer the call of a legendary prophecy.I'll share more later.
>>57992394If I can get my own games I'm running wrapped up. I've been thinking of a play-by-post game to maintain our anonymity since people round these parts are adverse to Discord (for good reason)
What's the default template for most OCs here?
>>57994308Fuck it, I'm doing all of them.

>>57993928Tobio: The Assistant Detective of the Celadon Extranormal Detective Agency, which is odd because he is the only person that works at the small office. The conclusion he comes to is that the real detective has somehow been erased from his memories by one of the paranormal threats the agency often deals with. Now the former conman and his ball of sunshine Poochyena must simultaneously unravel the ghostly conspiracy targeting a young woman and piece together the incoherent clues left behind by his nonexistent boss.
>>57993218Are you going to put a guy super obsessed with killing chaos/put the Strangers of paradise lore in there(yes strangers of paradise is kind of a prequel to FF 1 canonically)

>>57994738I'm aware of Strangers of Paradise, but I haven't played it myself so no. I'm using mostly the NES version as a basis without some of the major changes made by any of the remakes (looking at you, Flying Fortress). Along with some obscure sources for references, like Captain N or the japanese novelizations. Other than that I'm taking a LOT of liberties to fill out the events of the story and setting to work with pokemon. Not so much that it would be completely unrecognizable to anybody who has played FF1, but enough so that somebody completely unaware of Final Fantasy can enjoy it as medieval fantasy pokemon story.But you know, you've inspired me to maybe throw in "We're here to KILL Mewtwo."

>>57994639>>57993928There must be a lot more to these guys; it kind of reads like a small part of a bigger story. Col's brother, the young woman Tobio is helping, both of their Pokémon. How did Tobio get his job, and why did he stop being a conman?

>>57991874>>57987560>>57987707I like it. I think that the color scheme of her bottoms matches much better with her outfit. Beefcake Ivy was funny but I think the way that you softened her figure, it makes her design work better. I like both the old and new shirts and I think Ivy might change between them occasionally. It seems like you're going for a cross of "streetwear", nurse, and "formal-ish" attire. Now I'm going to review her shopping list.>New shortsI like the reference to the BW fem-protag with the coloration. The color also just feels more natural.>New beltAwesome. Definitely an upgrade.>Frilly fist guardsI welcome the frills, but I'd make the red pink, personally.>Frilly thigh highsThey're certainly more feminine, but I feel like the old socks were more... athletic?>New HatI like the idea of that star being Ivy's sort of "personal" logo, but I'm not sure if the red clashes with the rest of her outfit.>New topI like this one because it looks just a little bit more formal to contrast with her old outfit. She could maybe wear this to stuff like gym battles while her shirt with the pocket could be more "formal">PumpsI'd make them pink, personally.>Heal BallsIt makes sense for her occupation. However, I'm not sure if the color scheme matches up exactly with the rest of her outfit. She may want to paint a custom color combination with the same pattern. It could be a way of showing how she makes stuff for her Pokemon.>Thong...I don't know how I feel about it. >///<Bibi-moding again?I like that you didn't shoehorn asymmetry, but I'm just a bit iffy on the inclusion of such a vibrant red because imo it kind of conflicts with the more pastel-ish shirt and pants. If you want to lean more into the “mature and feminine” aspects you could give her some jewelry maybe some cute bracelets, necklace, or a navel piercing (yes I am biased but I do think she’d look good with one and it would help bring out the more feminine figure of her redesign)

>>57994876Col's brother isn't super important, but Wol's best friend is.Garland: The leader of the Royal Knights division of the Cornerian knighthood, Garland and his partner Charizard have remained undefeated in battle since childhood. But the charismatic young knight in training's pride and confidence never turned to arrogance thanks to his best friends Wol and Blastoise always keeping up one step behind him, and the critical reprimands from Princess Sarah and Venusaur. But after revealing to Wol that a terrifying vision of some approaching calamity has been haunting his dreams he begins to grow distant. With growing desperation he sets a desperate plan in motion protect his friends and home.As for Tobio's client.Josalyn: For an appointment she can't remember with who or why, she arrives at the detective agency in the hopes of dispelling a deep sense of loss and dread that has been looming over her. To her dismay she only finds an unprepared Tobio who attempts to introduce her to the world of the paranormal as professionally as possible. Though hardly a skeptic, she and her shiny raticate Amore are practical enough to be wary of scams. And savvy enough to cut her loses and leave when a digital demon trapped on the agency's computer interrupts their conversation in an attempt to possess her. Too bad Tobio is likely the only thing that stands between her and a phantom out for blood.And you're right about being parts of a larger story. If you're really curious, I've already posted several chapters of each of their stories.https://archiveofourown.org/works/63406333Pokemon Crystal Light - A Pokemon Final Fantasyhttps://archiveofourown.org/works/66247705Pokenormal - Files from the Celadon Extranormal Detective AgencyI'll share more details here if you'd like that, I'm here to talk about the characters after all.

>>57994876>>57995088Now to answer your questions.Wol starts the story with only a Blastoise, but so far he's gotten a Hitmonchan, Chansey, and Vileplume on his team. Pretty much, since there are six classes in FF1 he is going to have a pokemon for each of them. Blastoise as the Warrior/Knight, Hitmonchan as the Monk, Chansey as the White Mage/Cleric, and Vileplume as the Black Mage/Wizard. I've got two more mons planned for his final team, but that would be spoilers.Tobio only has his Poochyena as the detective is not a battler. The dark type is the friendliest puppy in the world and will happily burn or electrify its tongue to give a friendly lick to anybody. And while more of a lover than a fighter it will firmly stand its ground against the non-pokemon ghouls and specters that the agency has to deal with. Despite its antics, its a surprisingly polite puppy. It makes sure that its goofy shenanigans only ever inconvenience Tobio and never the clients.As for why he stopped being a conman... Its fairly simple. The detective agency gave him a chance to use his skills of charismatic manipulation and quick thinking to leave a life of crime behind. He can't remember how it happened, but he feels a debt of gratitude that could only be for the detective that was erased. So the only thing to do is find them regardless of the dangers. He ain't gonna lose to some memory loss.

>>57959892So I worked out the kinks of my OC's backstory, but then opened up a whole other can of worms with how the overall story of the region plays out. The Player (Protagonist) is sent 10 years into the future by a Pokémon with dominion over Time (Arceus/Dialga/Celebi) and has to continue their journey as if nothing happened, but they learn gradually about their predicament. The Rival (my OC) suffered a number of crushing defeats against the Player & in fact lost one of their Pokémon during their "final" battle against each other (likely either their Morpeko or Weavile- which causes serious, gutting trauma) leading them to changing their entire Type Specialty from Dark to Poison to mitigate all of Dark's weaknesses, becoming the 8th & final Gym Leader of the Region (possibly Unova?) after Roxie leaves the Gym to pursue her career as a Rock Star- but returns after the Rival- whom I'll call Magenta for simplicity's sake, requests their return (or maybe Klara? Idk) in order to challenge the Pokémon League to become the Champion and final challenge in their shared journey. The Rival's Starter will depend on the Type chosen by the Player as usual- but those wouldn't be the official starters of the region obviously.
>>57995384So, this means he will recognize us (the player) in the 10 year timeskip, or the trauma happens during the future timeline?
Considering posting OCs as I finish them instead of all together (despite them being a group) to prevent spam...
>>57995976>to prevent spamand leave us with BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP GET POSTED GET POSTED GET POSTED?spam nigguh
if you unironically seethe about bumping, then you can always just leave the thread>>57995976do what you want
>>57995986What the fuck, there are still enough bronies out there to make pony versions of Deltarune characters?

>>57995088>>57995124I actually found the archive when I searched "Celadon Extranormal Detective Agency," but I didn't want to agree to the terms of service. I hope Wol's adventure is going well. Is it following the FF1 story beat by beat, or did it diverge from it?And does Tobio have any leads yet?
>>57991956https://files.catbox.moe/w76fci.pngNExt part of the event, nothing much going on after that whole monkey mutt thing.
>>57996049Quartz won a fight because he had the high ground. He held onto the moral high ground, too, by choosing to spare someone's life.

>>57995722Yes, Champion Magenta will recognize you (the player) when they meet at the Pokémon League, but it's intended that the Player not immediately recognize their Rival until it's subtly revealed through dialogue- and then explicitly after the battle. And no, the trauma from losing their Sneasel (decided to un-evolve the Weavile making it to where they never got to use the Razor Claw on it, and ended up finding a Hisuian Sneasel to use it on instead) is what spurs them on to change their type specialty and get stronger, but then the Player goes missing because of the 10 year time travel, and without the losses to the player constantly holding them back- they're able to excel and achieve their status as Gym Leader- but upon hearing that they've "returned", that prompts them to relinquish their Gym to their Disciple & become the Champion before the Player has a chance to.And yes, time changes a lot of things-

>>57996035For Wol, well is relative. His story is going to hit every story beat of the original, but the details of why events play out the way they do are fleshed out to suit a story about Pokemon. So if you read like a wiki summary of the story you will know stuff like 'They defeat the pirates and gain a ship, meet a blind witch, meet the dwarves, discover the cursed elf prince, head to the marsh caves to find a crown...' but the actual specifics will be played around with.For example, the blind witch Matoya in the original games? Matoya is a hex maniac black mage living with the white mage Joy of Pravoka in a pokemon TM (Type Magic) shop they own together. She tends yo an exotic garden behind the shop with her Paras which they use as ingredients for the TMs they sell. But she insists that she is not a witch. That would be her cranky mother, who lives in cave to the north. And her mother is in fact an wise, powerful, and sassy blind Vileplume who has been attacked, cursed, and robbed by an unknown dark elf. Refusing to sit around and rot away while Wol attempts to find a way to save her she joins him as one of the prophesied Pokemon of Light. But as for well, Wol is suffering from grief of the events of the chaos temple as best as he can. He is also doing his best to protect Princess Sarah's younger sister, Jane Corneria the Second and her pikachu, who immediately ran away from home to follow him on an adventure. She is dealing with her own grief, and despite being an energetic brat the two end up supporting each other as an older brother younger sister sort of relationship. Especially because Jane already assumes the clueless Wol is going to marry her sister Sarah.

>>57996035For Tobio and leads, the first lead is Josalyn herself. She arrives the same day as he realizes his memory has been altered with memory problems of her own and assumes that this can't be a coincidence. Which is why her deciding she wants nothing to do with the paranormal mere minutes after arriving is a problem. He follows her out into the hallway of the office complex the agency is housed in to try and convince her to stick around. Only for them to be immediately attacked outside the office by... The ghost of Gym Leader Erika?! But she isn't even dead!
>>57996213Instead of "Type Magic" you could use "Tome Move" to account for Physical Attacks. Instead of your typical compact disc it can be a book colored appropriately for each type.

>>57996308In the setting, all moves are considered a form of magic. Physical moves are just a pokemon's powers expressed through physical forms. And TMs come in a lot of different forms. Single use potions and scrolls, reusable tomes and artifacts, etc... A tome would more likely be a collection of reusable TMs.

>>57996186I see>>57996325Oh, this sounds neat. Sooner or later I will download a NES emulator and play the original FFs. It's been also a long time since I played games like Contra and Robotek. Oh, maybe I can play the original Megami Tensei games, or Metroid. Not having a good map (if at all) is going to suck, tho.

>>57996836Yeah, I never actually played the OG NES version of FF myself. Fake fan lmao. I'm a big fan of the series as a whole and decided that FF1 would be a good place to start when it comes to writing a pokemon fanfic for it. Its so barebones that you get a lot of freedom in interpreting it, which is apparent for the different interpretations the first game has gotten in different remakes and spinoffs. Wol is actually named after the protagonist Wol from FF Mobius, a phone game that got discontinued that does an alternate tale involving Garland and Sarah and all that. Pretty much the world is prophesized to be saved by a man name Wol, so there is just a constant wave of guys named Wol being isekai'd to the setting in masse. So the majority of NPCs you meet in the game are actually other guys named Wol.
>>57996005I guess I may as well post the first guy then
>>57996049Sweet, my girl turned into the proper villain of the game
>>57991874>>57991925>>57994308>>57994472new template has arrived
>>57997069Why does this read like a speed dating profile?

I am playing Pokémon Grey today, and while Quartz and Team Warpstar are still in the distortion world, I get to play Darius. We finally left the tower and got off next to Unova Route 20. The new party got the Pokémon from Team Warpstar's PC, who were thought lost until now. They had been transported to the PMD world and have been on an adventure there, and now those Pokémon return as part of this new team. Darius has one of Quartz's Pokémon, a Patrat named Eyeke, One of Mocchi's Pokémon (the player we kicked out), a Solosis named Goodberry. And a Rowlet named Rowline, who is naturally born from the PMD world.At long last, the Pokémon journey in Unova can get back on track!
>>57997243All OCs are for horny purposes, don't let anybody ever tell you otherwise.

>>57991874Honored to have made the OP, but my vote went to Luke personally. He deserves a spotlight for his hard work <3 Also great job on the updated archives, I can tell a lot of time and effort went into sorting everything.>Thread question: What kind of books does your OC like to read?Despite her appearances, Ivy is quite studious and often reads text books about medicine or other pokemon aid related topics. She's not the naturally intelligent type, so she works hard to keep up when it comes to book smarts in her field and loves keep tabs on Pokemon with healing capabilities in her notebook. Besides that, Ivy's subscription to "Machamp & Fitness" magazine keeps her up to date on all the latest fitness trends and pictures of muscular men and Pokemon. She loves a good macho publication.>Drawing Task: Draw your OC as if they are from another IP, could be Digimon, could be monster hunter, etc.In honor of the new Panty and Stocking season coming out, enjoy Ivy in that style>>57990455>Is she tough enough to spar with Pokémon?Sure is. I like to imagine the black belt trainers regularly train and spar with their pokemon and Ivy's no exception. Hitmonchan is her main sparring partner, but she often likes to compete with her other Pokemon in other ways too, like racing or other physical feats. In her epilogue Alola arc, she also manages to subdue a Buzzwole in combat and catch it, adding another sparring partner to her roster.>>57995384Wow Magenta really went full send after losing one of her mons, she's barely recognizable after the fact. Really cool backstory though. I'm a huge sucker for different variants of a team based on starter choice too. Just wait until she learns about Dark AND Poison types.>>57996186>ended up finding a Hisuian Sneasel to use it on insteadI think losing her original sneasel only to replace it with a poison type instead is a really great idea. I love how her resentment of the player fuels her motivation

>>57995048I wasn't expecting such comprehensive feedback lol thanks, appreciate it. I'll explain my thought process behind some of the design choices>Frilly thigh highsI thought it was an easy way to soften her up overall and make her a bit more girly. Fun fact, I added the frills on the fist guards to match the ones I put on the socks. So in a chicken and egg situation, thigh highs came first.>Star logoI'm not entirely sold on the star logo desu, especially cuz Miko has a heavier star motif. I meant for it to be a kind of an alternate take on a red cross (four points), just felt appropriate to give her some sort of emblem. I considered making it a half pokeball design to ground her in the Pokemon world more, but truthfully just got lazy and didn't want to go back and change it.>New TopChanging out her outfit/mixing and matching is a good idea, especially for a girl who's interested in fashion>Red pumpsI originally had her wearing some form of pink boots/footwear, and it just felt off to me. I think the red on her feet and fists in contrast to her overall pink appearance is a good signifier that those are her "weapons" so to speak. The accents on her top and headgear are there to tie it all together. And it's not like red wasn't a part of her color palate prior. Red and pink go together imo, very valentine-y >ThongJust some classic fighting game character spice of adding unnecessary sex appeal :P>Heal BallsPainting a custom pokeball isn't really her style. When it comes to superficial things, she's not really a crafty type of person. She much prefers to buy things already made and wouldn't spend the time it takes to DIY, she's much to impatient for that. That's not to say she won't mix up her own medicines or make a protein shake for her mons, she always has time for fixing up others or getting stronger. Besides, they're too practical and cheap for her not to love them.
>>57997330I feel I could make a Kayda joke, but that horse has been dead a looooooong time.

Pokémon Grey ended with us arriving at Pokémon school. Darius and his team will be teaching the four on the left. Darius is going to be training Cobalt (not knowing that Cobalt is actually way stronger than he is). I look forward to the next session; this one ended too soon for me!

>>57997424>Just wait until she learns about Dark AND Poison types.I specifically avoided using any combination Poison/Dark-Types because it would mute the whole dynamic Type change if the character didn't completely shed that aspect that resulted in her many defeats, & eventual loss of her Sneasel.>losing her original sneasel only to replace it with a poison type insteadI wouldn't say replace, moreso like- after befriending/catching the Hisuian Sneasel & seeing that it doesn't struggle with the same Type disadvantages as the original, she decides to box her Dark party & pursue a more stable & harmonic team that relies on each other (like Toxic Spikes setup for Venoshock or Hex) I feel like the nostalgic familiarity & fondness for the new Sneasel & her excitement for battle, reignited that desire to keep fighting- and get back on her feet and aim for the top, even if it means crawling at first.>she's barely recognizable after the factI'm glad to hear that
Good morning, /tog/. Let's have a great week!
Midge update: It's her birthday. It is also International Be Nice To Bugs Day.
>>57998835Or I guess its National not International. Either way, spend some time with your buggies (buddies) today!

>>57999880>>57999932She was pretty broken to begin with, losing her Sneasel was only the tipping point.>swears revengeShe already got her revenge. Haven't decided between these two scenarios yet- but it turns out that she's responsible for the Player being sent 10 years into the future. (I know this isn't how it works in-game but-) Space Time Distortions pop up occasionally (haven't decided why yet) and similarly to how Pokémon that appear in them vanish along with the Distortions, the Player is either:Shoved into the Distortion just as it's closing by a shadowy figure (the Rival), or-The Player & Rival are exploring/investigation a Distortion when it begins to close, and either trips or abandons the Player inside the Distortion after they're able to get out safely. The guilt causes some major changes to their character both good & bad. With their Rival & their greatest obstacle out of the way, they're able to excel and achieve things they weren't previously able to due to discouragement, coming into their own as a successful and well know Gym Leader & member of the Pokémon League. It's only after the Player reappears 10 years later does the trauma kick back in and she has the sudden desire to fight her way to the top again tooth & nail in order to stay ahead of her Rival. She requests the return of the original Gym Leader and leaves the Gym in their hands.
